about_me.des: I am a software engineer. Familar with Java/Python/Groovy/Bash language.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.redhat3_desc: 1) Developing CI/CD pipeline for opensource product Redhat Process Automation Manager and Decision Manager, including on-premise, and cloud solutions for openshift 2) Deliver Productization solutions 3) Team management, hiring etc. Tech area - Java, JEE8, Jenkins DSL, CI/CD, python, groovy, Ansible, Openshift, OpenStack etc.
career.redhat3_job: Associate manager - Redhat Middleware R&D department
career.redhat2_desc: 1) Opensource Productization for Redhat RHPAM & RHDM (aka BRMS and BPMSuite). 2) Product integration for Redhat middle integration platform product like EAP, RHPAM, RHDM, Fuse etc. 3) Tools developing to automate the process. 4) Coordinate among global team across(upstream developer, QE, PM, GSS) Tech area - JavaEE, maven, groovy, Python, Shell script, Linux, Docker, drools, jbpm, Jenkins etc
career.redhat2_job: Project Leader - Redhat Middleware R&D department
career.redhat1_desc: 1) Developing and delivery Redhat SOA, Drools integration production. 2)Developing tools for automation. Tech area includes Java, JEE, Maven, ant, Python etc.
career.redhat1_job: Senior Software Engineer - Redhat JBoss R&D department.
career.moto_desc: Designing and developing and bugfixing for the database in the Motorola mobile platform. Tech - C programming, rational database, MySQL, Linux, mobile platform.
career.moto_job: Senior Software Engineer - Motorola Mobile platform R&D
career.yongyou_desc: Responsibility scope includes 1) Developing workflow engine 2) Developing front tier framework using AJAX , taglib. Tech area - BPMN, workflow engine, JBoss, javascript, AJAX, Taglib, J2EE
career.cugb_desc: Study in CUGB University for both master and bachelor degree, 7 years. Worked half year full time job in 2000. (Employer:Beijing Dison DongHua, co. Ltd)  Keywords -KaoYan, 1st Prize of Advance Mathematical Competition; CET band 6, Internship in IT company each year
career.cugb_job: Master degree - Computer Science, Bachelor degree - Construction Engineering
career.ltyz_desc: Province Key high school Keywords - Class 2nd score in the College Entrance Exam
